mapper.select: SELECT M.CROW , M.TROW , M.FMT_CNTC_DT , M.FMT_CNTC_HH , M.ABSNC_RSON_CD , M.ABSNC_RSON_NM , M.CST_SV_ASN_NO , M.CNTC_DT , M.CNTC_HH , M.PRTNR_NO , M.PRTNR_KNM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS CROW , T1.TROW , T1.FMT_CNTC_DT , T1.FMT_CNTC_HH , T1.ABSNC_RSON_CD , T1.ABSNC_RSON_NM , T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T1.CNTC_DT , T1.CNTC_HH , T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.PRTNR_KNM FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS TROW , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S1.CNTC_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FMT_CNTC_DT , SUBSTR(S1.CNTC_HH, 0, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(S1.CNTC_HH, 3, 2) AS FMT_CNTC_HH , S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'ABSNC_RSON_CD', S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD, 'ko') AS ABSNC_RSON_NM , S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , S1.CNTC_DT , S1.CNTC_HH , O1.PRTNR_NO , O1.PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_CNTC_IZ S1 LEFT JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 ON S1.OG_TP_CD = O1.OG_TP_CD AND S1.PRTNR_NO = O1.PRTNR_NO AND O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(S1.CNTC_DT, 0, 6) WHERE S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo} ) T1 ) M WHERE M.CROW BETWEEN (('9' * ('1' -1)) + 1) AND ('9' * '1') ORDER BY M.CROW

SELECT I1.AS_AK_ID , I1.SYS_DV_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD_NM , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD_NM , T2.AS_IST_OJ_NO , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , S1.SELL_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PRD_MNGT_TP_CD', S1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD_NM , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID , (SELECT X1.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X1 WHERE X1.USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID) FST_RGST_USR_NM , T2.MTR_STAT_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MTR_STAT_CD', T2.MTR_STAT_CD) AS MTR_STAT_CD_NM , T1.WK_EXCN_DT , T1.WK_EXCN_HH , T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM , T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD , T1.WK_CAN_MO_CN , I1.URGT_YN , T2.VST_RQDT , T2.VST_AK_HH , T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD , (SELECT X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_A X1 WHERE T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD) CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD_NM , T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD , (SELECT X1.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_B X1 WHERE T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD) CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD_NM , T2.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD , (SELECT X1.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_C X1 WHERE T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD AND T2.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD) CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD_NM , T2.CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD , T2.SMS_FW_YN , T2.DP_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_DV_CD', T2.DP_DV_CD) DP_DV_CD_NM , T2.SV_ET_AMT , T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID , O1.OG_NM SV_CNR_OG_NM , T1.WK_PRTNR_NO , O2.PRTNR_KNM AS WK_PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_IFIN_CST_CNR_AS_AK_RCV_ETXT I1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 ON I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S1 ON T1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_OG_BAS O1 ON T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID = O1.OG_ID INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS O2 ON T1.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.WK_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WK_PRTNR_NO = #{wkPrtnrNo} AND I1.RCPDT = #{wkDt}

SELECT I1.AS_AK_ID , I1.SYS_DV_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD_NM , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD_NM , T2.AS_IST_OJ_NO , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , S1.SELL_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PRD_MNGT_TP_CD', S1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD_NM , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID , (SELECT X1.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X1 WHERE X1.USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID) FST_RGST_USR_NM , T2.MTR_STAT_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MTR_STAT_CD', T2.MTR_STAT_CD) AS MTR_STAT_CD_NM , T1.WK_EXCN_DT , T1.WK_EXCN_HH , T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM , T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD , T1.WK_CAN_MO_CN , I1.URGT_YN , T2.VST_RQDT , T2.VST_AK_HH , T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD , (SELECT X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_A X1 WHERE T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD) CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD_NM , T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD , (SELECT X1.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_B X1 WHERE T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD) CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD_NM , T2.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD , (SELECT X1.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD_NM FROM CCSDBS.TB_CLASS_C X1 WHERE T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_HCSF_CD AND T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_MCSF_CD AND T2.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD = X1.CNSL_TP_LCSF_CD) CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD_NM , T2.CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD , T2.SMS_FW_YN , T2.DP_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_DV_CD', T2.DP_DV_CD) DP_DV_CD_NM , T2.SV_ET_AMT , T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID , O1.OG_NM SV_CNR_OG_NM , T1.WK_PRTNR_NO , O2.PRTNR_KNM AS WK_PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_IFIN_CST_CNR_AS_AK_RCV_ETXT I1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 ON I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S1 ON T1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_OG_BAS O1 ON T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID = O1.OG_ID INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS O2 ON T1.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.WK_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WK_PRTNR_NO = #{wkPrtnrNo} AND I1.RCPDT = #{wkDt}

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_NM , T1.SDING_SPP_NO , T1.SDING_PD_CD1 , P1.PD_NM AS SDING_PD_NM1 , T1.SDING_QTY1 , T1.SDING_PD_CD2 , P2.PD_NM AS SDING_PD_NM2 , T1.SDING_QTY2 , T1.SDING_PD_CD3 , P3.PD_NM AS SDING_PD_NM3 , T1.SDING_QTY3 , T1.SDING_PD_CD4 , P4.PD_NM AS SDING_PD_NM4 , T1.SDING_QTY4 , T1.SDING_PD_CD5 , P5.PD_NM AS SDING_PD_NM5 , T1.SDING_QTY5 , T1.VST_DT FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_CNFM_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON T1.SDING_PD_CD1 = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON T1.SDING_PD_CD2 = P2.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P3 ON T1.SDING_PD_CD3 = P3.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P4 ON T1.SDING_PD_CD4 = P4.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P5 ON T1.SDING_PD_CD5 = P5.PD_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn})

WITH BASE AS ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.PDCT_PD_CD , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') TODAY , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 40, 'YYYYMMDD') TODAY_PLUS_40_DAY , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.IST_DT), 2), 'YYYYMMDD') IST_PLUS_2_MONTH_DT , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.IST_DT), 4), 'YYYYMMDD') IST_PLUS_4_MONTH_DT , (SELECT GREATEST(SUBSTR(MAX(X1.MTR_CAN_DT), 1, 4) || '1231', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 40, 'YYYYMMDD')) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.MTR_CAN_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) LAST_MTR_CAN_DT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) ) SELECT Y1.CNTR_NO , Y1.CNTR_SN , Y1.VST_DUEDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(Y1.VST_DUEDT) - 41, 'YYYYMMDD') CH_VST_CL_DT , Y1.STP_DUEDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(Y1.STP_DUEDT) - 41, 'YYYYMMDD') STP_CL_DT , Y1.LAST_STP_DT , Y1.GDC_CD , Y1.GDC_NM , Y1.SALE_CD FROM (SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.PDCT_PD_CD GDC_CD , P1.PD_NM GDC_NM , S1.BASE_PD_CD SALE_CD -- 패키지 변경 가능일자 --1. 방문 스케쥴표상에 금일 기준 + 40일 한 날짜 보다 큰 일정 중 제일 작은 날짜를 선택 --2. 스케쥴표가 없다면 설치 일자 기준으로 2달 뒤에 날짜가 금일 기준 + 40일 한 날짜 보다 크면 그 날짜를 아니면 4달 뒤에 날짜를 선택 , NVL( (SELECT MIN(X1.VST_DUEDT) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.VST_DUEDT > T1.TODAY_PLUS_40_DAY), (CASE WHEN T1.TODAY_PLUS_40_DAY < T1.IST_PLUS_2_MONTH_DT THEN T1.IST_PLUS_2_MONTH_DT ELSE T1.IST_PLUS_4_MONTH_DT END) ) AS VST_DUEDT -- 2019.05.13 이충관 수정 - 모종중지 내역이 있는 고객의 경우 12개월 이후 중지 가능에서 연도 별 1회 모종중지신청 가능하도록 쿼리 수정(이난영과장님요청) , NVL( (SELECT MIN(X1.VST_DUEDT) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.VST_DUEDT > NVL(T1.LAST_MTR_CAN_DT, T1.TODAY_PLUS_40_DAY)), (CASE WHEN T1.TODAY_PLUS_40_DAY < T1.IST_PLUS_2_MONTH_DT THEN T1.IST_PLUS_2_MONTH_DT ELSE T1.IST_PLUS_4_MONTH_DT END) ) AS STP_DUEDT , (SELECT MAX(X1.MTR_CAN_DT) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.MTR_CAN_DT <= T1.TODAY ) LAST_STP_DT FROM BASE T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S1 ON T1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON T1.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD ) Y1

WITH WK_GRP AS ( SELECT Z1.* FROM TB_SVPD_BPD_BIZ_TP_WK_GRP_IZ Z1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD IN ('3110', '3310', '3320') AND Z1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN Z1.APY_STRTDT AND Z1.APY_ENDDT AND Z1.IZ_SN = (SELECT MAX(Y1.IZ_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_BPD_BIZ_TP_WK_GRP_IZ Y1 WHERE Z1.PD_CD = Y1.PD_CD AND Z1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = Y1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND Y1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN Y1.APY_STRTDT AND Y1.APY_ENDDT) ) SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , W1.WK_GRP_CD AS WK_GRP_CD1 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_GRP_CD', W1.WK_GRP_CD) AS WK_GRP_NM1 , W2.WK_GRP_CD AS WK_GRP_CD2 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_GRP_CD', W2.WK_GRP_CD) AS WK_GRP_NM2 , W3.WK_GRP_CD AS WK_GRP_CD3 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_GRP_CD', W3.WK_GRP_CD) AS WK_GRP_NM3 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T1 LEFT JOIN WK_GRP W1 ON T1.PDCT_PD_CD = W1.PD_CD AND W1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3110' LEFT JOIN WK_GRP W2 ON T1.PDCT_PD_CD = W2.PD_CD AND W2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3310' LEFT JOIN WK_GRP W3 ON T1.PDCT_PD_CD = W3.PD_CD AND W3.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3320' WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn})

SELECT T1.IST_LCT_DTL_CN FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_PDCT_IST_LCT_DTL T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AND T1.DTL_SN = (SELECT MAX(X1.DTL_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_PDCT_IST_LCT_DTL X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')

SELECT '올클린서비스 ' || T1.ASN_OJ_YM || '월 대상고객입니다' AS ALL_CLEAN_MSG , NVL2(T1.ASN_OJ_YM, 'Y', 'N') AS ALL_CLEAN_YN FROM TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ASN_OJ_YM >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMM') AND T1.PU_PART_PD_CD IN ('WM07104602', 'WM07104667', 'WM07104669') AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY T1.ASN_OJ_YM

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CHANGE_COUNT FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AND T1.REFRI_DV_CD = '1' AND T1.ITM_PD_CD IN ('WM07105864' /* GLASS CARE BS교체 RK1B1,RM523 */ , 'WM07105786' /* 등패드 */ , 'WM07105787' /* 머리패드 */ , 'WM07105788') /* 어깨패드 */

SELECT S1.DTL_CNTR_NO , S1.DTL_CNTR_SN , S2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , S2.MEXNO_ENCR , S2.CRAL_IDV_TNO , S2.LOCARA_TNO , S2.EXNO_ENCR , S2.IDV_TNO , A1.NEW_ADR_ZIP , A1.RNADR , A1.RDADR FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL S1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS S2 ON S1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = S2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS A1 ON S2.ADR_ID = A1.ADR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND S1.DTL_CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AND S1.ADRPC_TP_CD = '2' /* 배송지(2) */ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN S1.VL_STRT_DTM AND S1.VL_END_DTM

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END BS_STOP_YN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST T2 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AND T2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '302' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T2.HIST_STRT_DTM AND T2.HIST_END_DTM AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHANGE_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3531' /*비스포크 교체*/ AND T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn})

SELECT CASE WHEN (Y1.RANGE_CHANGE_CNT > 0 OR Y1.RANGE_CHANGE_BS_CNT > 0) OR Y1.ITEM_CNT > 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHANGE_POSSIBLE_YN FROM (SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3124' /*전기레인지 글라스 상판 교체 서비스*/ AND T2.PD_CD IN ('WM05100114', 'WM05100966', 'WM05100967') /*전기레인지*/ AND T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) ) AS RANGE_CHANGE_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2178' /*전기레인지 글라스 상판교체 BS*/ AND T1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) ) AS RANGE_CHANGE_BS_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AND T1.REFRI_DV_CD = '1' /* 무상 */ AND T1.ITM_PD_CD IN ('WM07105864' /* GLASS CARE BS교체 RK1B1,RM523 */ , 'WM07105786' /* 등패드 */ , 'WM07105787' /* 머리패드 */ , 'WM07105788') /* 어깨패드 */ ) ITEM_CNT FROM DUAL ) Y1

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.AK_SN , T1.RGST_DT , T1.AS_AK_DV_CD , CASE WHEN T1.AS_AK_DV_CD = '1' THEN '제품변경' WHEN T1.AS_AK_DV_CD = '4' THEN '미배송요청' END AS_AK_DV_NM , T1.AK_CHDT , T1.BFCH_PD_CD , (SELECT X.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS X WHERE X.PD_CD = T1.BFCH_PD_CD ) BFCH_PD_NM , T1.AFCH_PD_CD , (SELECT X.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS X WHERE X.PD_CD = T1.AFCH_PD_CD ) AFCH_PD_NM , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS X WHERE X.PRTNR_NO = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID ) PRTNR_KNM , (SELECT LISTAGG(A.PD_NM||' '||PART_QTY||'개'||CHR(13)||CHR(10), '') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.PD_NM||PART_QTY) AS DT_INFO /*패키지구성정보*/ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS A , (SELECT SUBSTR(PART_LIST, 1, INSTR(PART_LIST, ',',1,1)-1) AS PART_CD , SUBSTR(PART_LIST, INSTR(PART_LIST, ',',1,1)+1, (CASE WHEN INSTR(PART_LIST, ',',1,2) > 0 THEN INSTR(PART_LIST, ',',1,2) - INSTR(PART_LIST, ',',1,1)-1 ELSE LENGTH(PART_LIST) END)) AS PART_QTY FROM (SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^|]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS PART_LIST FROM (SELECT CHO_CAPSL_CN AS TXT FROM DUAL) T1 CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, '|', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0)) B WHERE 1=1 AND PART_CD = A.PD_CD ) AS PART_INFO , T1.MTR_PROCS_STAT_CD -- 작업상태 1:입력, 2:수정, 3:취소 , CASE WHEN T1.MTR_PROCS_STAT_CD = '1' THEN '입력' WHEN T1.MTR_PROCS_STAT_CD = '2' THEN '수정' WHEN T1.MTR_PROCS_STAT_CD = '3' THEN '취소' END MTR_PROCS_STAT_NM FROM TB_SVPD_HCF_AS_AK_HIST T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) ORDER BY T1.FST_RGST_DTM DESC

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.SPP_TCNT , T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T1.MEXNO_ENCR , T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T1.LOCARA_TNO , T1.EXNO_ENCR , T1.IDV_TNO , T1.SPP_ZIP , T1.SPP_BAS_ADR , T1.SPP_DTL_ADR , T1.REF_ADR , T1.ADR_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'ADR_DV_CD', T1.ADR_DV_CD, 'ko') AS ADR_DV_NM , T1.SPP_DPTU_DT , T1.SPP_FSH_DT , T1.USE_YN , CASE WHEN T1.SPP_FSH_DT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS POPUP_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_SPP_ADR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn})
